div.p: A set of codes that defines how a set of values are summarized in an aggregated computation, for use with sets of values do describe which aggregated statistic functions are to be applied (e.g., average, mode, min, max, standard deviation, variance).

valueString.value: Lock all vaue sets untouched since 2014-03-26 to trackingId 2014T1_2014_03_26
